column5: I'm heading up to Minden tomorrow, the last few weekends, the bait stores have been out of large shiners. Does anybody know if Trombly's or Minden Live Bait have got a shipment in?  thanks
kawartha bait and tackle has minnows, shiners, golden shiners, panfish size more than you would expect. there in lindsay though don't know if it's out of your way. 705-878-3474
